text:
I had a great experience at TSN and would highly recommend it to anyone seeking professional dermatological care! Dr. Joel impressed me with his deep expertise and calm professionalism. He took the time to explain each step thoroughly and made me feel completely at ease throughout the consultation.

The clinic staff are equally outstanding. Xiaoxin, Divya and Catherine were incredibly efficient and helpful, making the whole process smooth and seamless. A special mention goes to Xiaoxin, whose warm and nurturing demeanor makes it all the more pleasant. She has a gentle way of making clients feel cared for, a rare trait to come across in any industry!

My daughter is seeing Dr Koh Hong Yi for a few skin conditions. He is very meticulous and was able to identify one rarer skin condition rather quickly. The whole visit is very efficient and fast. Would recommend anyone to visit this specialist clinic.

I had a day surgery at the clinic and Dr Koh is very responsible and fast, extremely patient with all my questions. The day surgery was done quickly and recovery was fast. Nurses were very helpful as well to explain to me regarding claims procedures. I would definitely recommend this clinic.

Was a patient of Dr Koh in the earlier part of the year. Underwent 2 surgeries with him. Felt that he handled the surgeries and took care of me quite well. Do appreciate the advise that he has shared with me. He has also referred me to a specialist whom I have confidence in as well. Have to say that patients of Dr Koh should know that they are in good hands

I came with really bad eczema on my face, and in around 1-2 months it's completely gone thanks to my dermatologist, Dr Koh. Thank you :) Highly recommended, he is very patient explaining what triggers my eczema and how to make sure my eczema does not flare up again.
